page.title: 09SURVEY AROUND DAMHEAD.
page.content: As this area lies halfway between the towns of Coleraine and Ballymoney, and the holiday resorts of Portstewart, Portrush, and Castlerock are nearby, we did a survey to find out which towns the people used for shopping, entertainment etc. We found that 75% of the people shopped in Coleraine and 25% in Ballymoney. The majority of people, who did not work on a farm, worked in Coleraine. The primary school children go to Damhead Primary School. 66% of secondary school children attend schools in Coleraine, the remainder attend Ballymoney schools. For entertainment 90% of people go to Coleraine and 10% to Portrush. For a trip to the seaside 63% chose Portstewart, 25% Portrush and 12% Castlerock.
